content.html: RE: "People don't want to run their own servers." I will happily bet against this. If you make it easy, and accessible, people are more than willing to run their own infrastructure. There are plenty of challenges left to solve, but it is very much a challenge worth solving.
content.value:
RE: "People don't want to run their own servers."

I will happily bet against this. If you make it easy, and accessible, people are more than willing to run their own infrastructure. There are plenty of challenges left to solve, but it is very much a challenge worth solving.
